BUILDING_FAIRY_COMMAND DOMAIN_AIR 100
The good news is, fairies don't die, so your fairy units build at double speed. The bad news is, fairies have short attention spans, so you have to spend twice as much to keep their units active.
Cirno's fairies can re-arm military units faster than anyone, because any "dead" unit can just come back to base and get some more weapons or paper boats and airplanes.
Doubles production speed and upkeep cost of all units.
